Character

Class CharacterInventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • Character.Inventory
      • Character.CharacterInventory

  • public class CharacterInventory
extends Inventory
    Character Inventory is the inventory of the character is extends the Inventory class and is a sister class to the ChestInventory
